item.description: PIZZA PARTY at Gail Fuller’s cozy home in Bristol at 7 pm, dress casual. This is a great way to just hang out and relax after a busy week! You’ll enjoy a variety of delicious pizzas, salad, and dessert. Join us for a fun time. Admission $15. To reserve, call Gail 860-582-8229. Directions to 35 Anthony Drive: I-84 Exit 33 (Rt. 72W), then Exit 1 (Rt. 177), right onto North Washington Street, at 2nd light turn left onto Northwest Drive, at end right onto Camp Street, left onto O'Sullivan Drive, at end turn right to stop, left onto Brace Avenue, left onto Anthony Drive.

group.who: Come join us for a FUN time!
group.name: Singles Social Connections

item.name: Pizza Party
